data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release (Revised)
data.news_body: The Company has informed about that a typographical error was identified in the Press Release issued by the Company dated 6th February 2026 in relation to the Financial results for Q3 F26

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body: The Company has published a press release on the Financial Results for the Quarter and Nine months ended December 31 2025

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: The Company has published the advertisement of the Unaudited Financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025 approved by the Board at its Meeting held on February 4 2026 in Business Standard (English Newspaper) and Hindustan (Hindi Newspaper) on 5th February2026.

data.caption: Dividend Of Record Date
data.news_body: Dividend Record date is fixed as Tuesday February 10 2026 for Interim Dividend for F.Y. 2025-26

data.caption: Corporate Action-Board to consider Dividend
data.news_body: Declared Interim Dividend of Rs. 1.50 per equity share of face value of Rs. 10/- each for the Financial year 2025-26

data.news_body: Un-Audited Financial Results for the qaurter and nine months ended on December 31 2025

data.news_body: Un-Audited Financial Results for the qaurter and nine months ended on December 31 2025

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Held On Wednesday February 04 2026
data.news_body: Outcome of the Board Meeting held on Wednesday February 04 2026

data.caption:
Board Meeting Intimation for 1. To Consider And Approve The Unaudited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31 2025.
2. The Proposal For Payment Of Interim Dividend For The Financial Year Ending On 31St March 202
data.news_body:
BMW Ventures Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 04/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve 1. To consider and approve the Unaudited Financial results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025.
2. The proposal for payment of Interim Dividend for the Financial year ending on 31st March 2026.

data.descriptor: Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018
data.news_body: Certificate in terms of Regulation 74(5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018 for the quarter ended December 31 2025

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body:
The Trading Window for dealing in Securities of the Company will remain closed for all the Directors Promoters Designated Employees Connected Person and Immediate Relative from January 1 2026 till the declaration of the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and the nine month ending on December 31 2025

The Trading Window will open 48 hours after the said financial results are declared to the Company.

data.caption: Change In CIN NO Of The Company Due To Change In The Listing Status
data.news_body: Company CIN NO has changed from U25111BR1994PLC006131 to L25111BR1994PLC006131 due to change in the Listing Status of The Company. Approval of ROC has received on 13th December2025

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body:
The Company has received an order worth INR 6.2 Crore for Job work Processing order for Railway steel girders. Material will be provided by the Customer approved by Indian railways under steel girder business in RDSO approved facility. 


It is a revised file of the previous order filed

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: The Company has received an order of worth INR 6.02 Crores for the supply fabrication for bow steel string girder nad composite girder in the PEB Manufacturing division of the Company.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: The company has secured an order worth INR 4.53 Crore for the supply fabrication and coating of structural steel (Pre Engineered  Building) for a leading Oil and Gas PSU in the PEB Manufacturing Division of the Company.

data.news_body: The Company has received an order of INR 9.94 Crore for Fabrication and Supplyof Bow String girders in RDSO approved facility for Indian Railways under steel girder business.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: The Company has secured an order worth INR 28.95 Crore from Venus Star Construction Private Limited of TMT Bars of various sizes under Distribution Business.

data.descriptor: Award of Order / Receipt of Order
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Award_of_Order_Receipt_of_Order
data.news_body: The Company has received an order worth INR 5.11 Crore for supply of built up section along with accesories for Kolkata airport in the PEB manufacturing division of the Company.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of BMW Ventures Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from October 01 2025 the equity shares of BMW Ventures Ltd (Scrip Code: 544543) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of T Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250930- dated September 30 2025.
